entities.name: fox
entities.description: The fox is described as leaping from its hiding place and falling back to the ground after being struck by a flash of green light. The woman's voice dismissively identifies it as 'just a fox'.

entities.name: auror
entities.description: The Auror is mentioned in the context of Cissy's thought, suggesting that an Auror might be present.

entities.name: cissy
entities.description: Cissy is mentioned as someone who has a thought about the possibility of an Auror being present.

relationships.description: The text suggests that Cissy thinks there might be an Auror present, indicating a relationship between the two entities.
